short_description: mandharini is a real estate developer based in nairobi, kenya.
long_description: the design and master plan for the property have been completed by watg, one of the world's leading international resort and villa architects who have meticulously planned every detail to create the first world class coastal lifestyle experience in the region. with breathtaking views of kilifi creek and a david jones' designed golf course home buyers will experience unrivalled quality and value.

generated_description: mandharini kilifi is an award-winning luxury housing development located in kilifi, kenya. the property features 125 luxury homes with stunning views of the indian ocean lagoon known as kilifi creek. designed by watg, one of the world's leading international resort and villa architects, mandharini offers a world-class coastal lifestyle experience. the development has received recognition, including the "best development in africa" award at the bloomberg global property awards. mandharini is known for its eco-friendly luxury homes and provides a unique investment opportunity with potential for capital growth.
